core.security.certificate

Class CertificateAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.security.certificate.CertificateAbstract
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Certificate

    public abstract class CertificateAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstrac class represents basic oeprations for certificates X.509.
    Author:
    Mateusz Mucha
